attributes.action: Going out tricky, I would like to see restaurants and other eateries provide
attributes.additional_details: Quite simply for eateries to add carbs along side all children's meals/menues. I know one place that does this and it's a massive help and my daughter doesnt have to  wait for her meal it's so helpful. I do think its important as a parent dealing with a new diabetes diagnosis is stressful enough, I avoided taking my daughter out for months after her diagnosis it's so scary.
attributes.background: Taking Hope out to eat is tricky as most menus dont provide total carbs for children's meals, if it did it would be easier for us parents sometimes find I'm getting my phone out and googling which then delays my daughter getting her meal
